Data Products

The following is an overview of the data products created by the pipeline.

Data Products

File Extension

Unit

Note

b

DN/px

bias removed

d

DN/px

dark current removed

f

DN/px

detector flat removed

lenf

DN/px

lenslet flat removed

opt_cube

flux/px

data cube from OptimalExtract

chi_cube

flux/px

data cube from ChisquareExtract

Different master files generated during the analysis are listed below.

Master files created

File Extension

Full Name

Note

mcalib

Master monochromatic calibration

mbias

Master bias

mdark

Master dark

mflat

Master detector flat

mobj

Master object

opt_cube

IFS 3D cube using optimal extraction

chi_cube

IFS 3D cube using chi-square extraction
